main.bio: I recently received my undergraduate degree in Computer Science(Software Engineering) at Arizona State University. I have collaborated with global and local teams and have experience in Software Development, data analytics, data science, requirements gathering, process designing. I am also familiar with Agile methodology and have gained proficiency in the various phases of SDLC - from planning to change management activities.
main.name: Nikhil Netraganti

resume.skillmessage: Experienced in in Java, JavaScript, C++, C#, CSS/HTML, Mobile and Web App Development, Swift, Data Analytics, Data Visualization Tools, SQL, R and Python

work.title: Data Analyst
work.description: Created and maintained the department website and data repository using AWS and React. Peformed analysis and visualization for extremely large data-sets from our partners to combat resillience issues such as Homelessness and Urban Heat

work.title: Technical Analyst
work.description: Created and managed user stories and acceptance criteria for the development of a large-scale enhancement to a Medicaid system, resolving any bottlenecks and challenges and ensuring delivery according to schedule

projects.title: Naval Rescue21 Marine WIdget
projects.category: Worked with General Dynamics Missions Systems to build an application using exploratory interface (JC2CUI), also built CMAPI SaaS widgets on C# and .NET and automated testing using Selenium
